author: Frank Figliuzzi
title: Trump's contempt for U.S. intelligence likely made COVID-19 worse. Here's how.
description: I thought Trump's willful blindness might manifest itself in a failure to heed signs of a terrorist strike or a state-sponsored cyberattack. Instead, the missed warnings pointed to a pandemic.
content: Those of us who served in the intelligence community knew this day was coming. The day when President Donald Trump's near total disregard for intelligence professionals would eventually affect every American. Personally, I thought Trump's willful blindness mi… [+4911 chars]
